lead_paragraph: Juergen Klinsmann is targeting at least four points from two games against Mexico and Costa Rica this month as the United States aim to get off to a fast start in the final round of qualifying for the 2018 World Cup.

headline.print_headline: U.S. on Right Track After Tough 2015: Klinsmann
headline.main: U.S. on Right Track After Tough 2015: Klinsmann
